FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSection.description: Find answers to the most important questions about DMWV and our services

faq1.question: What is the role of DMWV in the wellness industry?
faq1.answer: The DMWV (German Medical Wellness Association) is a German association dedicated to promoting health and well-being through the integration of medical wellness. It provides industry certifications, guidance, and support for businesses focused on wellness and health tourism, playing a crucial role in setting standards and promoting quality in the industry.

faq2.question: What benefits do DMWV members receive?
faq2.answer: Members of DMWV gain access to a network of wellness professionals, industry certifications, participation in events, and resources to promote health and wellness services. This network and these resources help members stay at the forefront of the wellness industry and provide high-quality services to their clients.

faq3.question: How does DMWV support health tourism?
faq3.answer: DMWV promotes health tourism by partnering with wellness centers and medical spas, providing standards and certifications that enhance the reputation and quality of services offered. This helps establish Germany as a premier destination for health and wellness tourism, attracting visitors seeking high-quality medical wellness experiences.

qm.title: 1. The Quality Management System (QM)
qm.content: The companies to be certified should have a quality management system that essentially meets the requirements of DIN EN ISO 9001: 2000. This standard represents the state of knowledge at the time when it comes to the organization of a company. If this QM system is not available, the DMWV e.V. can show and implement ways to obtain it with interested companies. These industry-neutral requirements are adapted to the health orientation of a Medical Wellness company, so that this standard then forms the basis of DMWV certifications.

specific.title: 2. Specific Requirements
specific.content: These requirements were not newly developed, but the DMWV e.V. uses already existing and established solutions. For example, in the hotel segment, they consist of a combination of the 4-star requirements and the 3-W criteria. Furthermore, the companies must also meet specific Medical Wellness criteria.

hotel.title: 3. Medical Wellness Requirements using a Hotel as an Example
hotel.content: In this area too, additional requirements per category have been developed where it seems appropriate. Here's an example of the requirements for a Medical Wellness Hotel:
list: Definition of a scope under medical direction. This must cover a significant part of the treatment offer in the Medical Spa.
The medical management must be exercised by at least one licensed physician with a relevant specialty.
The physician(s) must exercise the focus of their professional activity in the hotel.
In addition, at least one therapist (e.g., physiotherapy) with relevant training must be employed full-time in the hotel.
There must be a medical on-call service available in the hotel or in the immediate vicinity for times when the doctor is absent.
When changing to medical specialties outside the hotel, the transfer of participant-related data is ensured.
A written final report must be available.
When applying complementary medical therapies, disclosure must be made on what effect basis the application is based.
The applications in the Medical Spa area are based on standardized examination forms and therapy plans.
The examination and treatment rooms have modern equipment and convey medical competence without a clinical atmosphere.

The facility meets the requirements for documenting results and for providing recommendations for continuing what has been learned (nutrition plan, exercise plan, healthy lifestyle, reference to internet pages).
The facility has a doctor who ensures the strongly recommended medical initial check.
The facility ensures that generally a performance diagnosis is carried out on guest patients before a movement and/or fitness program.
Upon request, the guest receives a written evaluation of his performance/performance change with recommendations for home.
hotel.conclusion: The company must achieve at least 70% of the possible points both in the total score and in the individual categories. Products are tested and certified by the DMWV e.V. according to a standardized system as well.

requirements.intro: The prerequisite for the certification of a Medical Wellness facility by the association is the willingness to participate in the certification program according to the audit criteria of the association and TÜV Rheinland Group. The certification according to the Medical Wellness Quality Standard (TÜV Rheinland/DMWV) is thus independent of the association.

navigator.title: "Navigator"
navigator.content: An indispensable prerequisite for the perception of Medical Wellness services in the sense of the association is the integration of a physician into the operation of the respective facility. In the DMWV, this physician bears the designation "Navigator" to make clear his role in dealing with the healthy guests who use the respective Medical Wellness facility.

doctor.title: The Doctor
doctor.content1: The central role of the navigator becomes clear from the figure below. This means that when certifying a Medical Wellness facility, the overall result depends very strongly on the perception of this role by the navigator/doctor.
doctor.content2: The figure also makes it clear that the diagnostic area, the accommodation area and the area of medical implementation do not necessarily have to form an infrastructural unit.

procedure.intro: Participating facilities in the association's certification program are checked by announced professional testers from TÜV Rheinland Group based on defined audit criteria. The certification is valid for 3 years each.

categories.intro: Medical Wellness facilities are certified in the following categories:
list: Medical Wellness Clinic
Medical Wellness Hotel
Medical Wellness Resort
Medical Wellness Day Spa/Clinic Centre
Medical Wellness Destination
categories.destination: For the certification of a Medical Wellness Destination, at least three individual elements from the categories must be certified.

process.intro: The certification process is open and is carried out according to audit criteria that are made available to the candidate in advance. The audit criteria are divided into four main areas:
list: Diagnostics
Medical Implementation
Medical Wellness Spa Facility
Hotel/Clinic Area

procedure.basis: The basis of the audit is the process defined by the association and TÜV Rheinland Group, which the Medical Wellness customer should basically go through. The facility to be audited independently determines in what form and to what extent the operation fulfills the specified process. Only these elements are included in the audit. In the audit report, the outstanding or unfulfilled elements of the process are evaluated and subsumed in an overall assessment, which appears on the plaque to be awarded by the association.

medicalWellness.title: Medical Wellness
medicalWellness.subtitle: Discover the benefits of Medical Wellness for your health and well-being

begriff.title: Concept
begriff.intro: The definition of Medical Wellness is currently in a dynamic and multi-layered process, influenced by international developments.
begriff.definitionText: "Medical Wellness encompasses scientifically supported measures for sustainable improvement of quality of life and subjective health perception through self-responsible prevention and health promotion, as well as motivation for a health-conscious lifestyle."
begriff.supportedBy: The new Medical Wellness definition is supported by organizations including the German Tourism Association, the German Medical Wellness Association, the German Spa Association, and the German Gymnastics Federation.
begriff.eschTitle: Medical Wellness according to Prof. Dr. T. Esch
begriff.eschText: Medical wellness refers to a multidimensional, dynamic-systematic process towards the active creation of holistic individual well-being in the context of scientifically proven health-promoting or medical factors. These factors are based on biopsychosocial needs, the "motivators", which individuals seek to satisfy with the help of treatments or behaviors with proven effectiveness. The focus is on the realization of a health-promoting lifestyle using individual resources, competence and personal responsibility in the sense of applied prevention or "integrated health promotion". Therapeutic measures for the desired balance of individual factors and needs as well as for the realization of subjective health, salutogenesis and well-being are usually offered in professional medical wellness centers, clinics or hotel-like facilities in cooperation with corresponding medically managed and scientifically based therapy departments.

kernbereiche.title: Core Areas
kernbereiche.intro: In the DMWV, health-promoting activities are divided into four core areas of Medical Wellness, primarily serving prevention.
kernbereiche.diagnosticsText: The focus is therefore on diagnostics, salutogenesis and actively adapting one's own life to health-promoting behavior. The prerequisite for this success is the fundamental willingness to act independently. This enables existing individual resources to be activated by strengthening positive, health-promoting potential. This in turn requires the willingness to participate in health education: the willingness to engage in a lifelong process with the goal of maintaining health through a health-oriented lifestyle.

markt.title: Market Potential and Current Development
markt.gkvInfo: For many years, the share of statutory health insurance (GKV) expenditure has only marginally exceeded the 6% threshold of gross domestic product.
markt.marketGrowth1: The permanently limited budget of the solidarity-financed statutory health insurance (GKV), high unemployment, demographic trends towards an aging society, and a high number of chronically ill people will result in healthcare spending in the first healthcare market (GKV) being focused on core services. Consequently, the out-of-pocket market (including co-payments or private supplementary insurance) will gain increasing importance.
markt.marketGrowth2: The Institute for Leisure Economics in Munich makes the following predictions: The number of travelers in Germany in the field of healthcare vacations will increase by 46% from 2002 to 2010. This corresponds to over 2 million travelers per year (in 2002, there were just under 1.4 million travelers). Other forms of health tourism (anti-aging vacations, wellness vacations, beauty vacations) are already experiencing strong growth. The share of healthcare vacations will account for almost half (48.3%) of all health-related travel by 2010. Total household spending on all health-related travel in Germany will increase to 3.7 billion euros by 2010.
markt.marketGrowth3: Even the U.S. medical spa market will reach a sales volume of over 400 million U.S. dollars by 2006 and will record an annual sales growth of 10.1% until then (Feedback Research Services).
markt.marketGrowth4: Anti-aging measures are among the key growth areas in health and leisure. This applies to the USA (Feedback Research Services) as well as Europe (Institute for Leisure Economics). In this sector, the market segment is expected to grow by 2,500% between 2002 and 2010.

partnerDescriptions.yorktest: When healthy food makes you sick... Food intolerances (FI) are among the most widespread triggers for a variety of complaints that impair our well-being. According to the latest scientific findings, one in five Central Europeans suffers from an FI. Yorktest offers the possibility to confirm or exclude the presence of an FI in advance through the test: FoodSCAN Indicator and recommends the tests: FoodSCAN Totality or FoodSCAN Quality in case of a positive result of the Indicator test.
partnerDescriptions.hohenbalance: Altitude training — Artificial mountains in sports and therapy! Höhenbalance AG, as the European market leader in the field of altitude training concepts, offers its customers the best possible technology. This is made possible by close cooperation with several supplier companies (Hypoxico, b-cat, Alto2Lab, and go2altitude), which offer different altitude training systems. The interdisciplinary team under the medical-scientific direction of Prof. Dr. Hermann Buhl supports clients in the areas of prevention and therapy as well as athletes and alpine sports enthusiasts who are training for the next competition or the next trekking tour. Höhenbalance convinces with state-of-the-art diagnostic procedures for sports and highly current methods in the field of overweight and other civilization diseases.
partnerDescriptions.dr-illing-partner: Regardless of the success and duration of the company's existence, the need to change something arises at some point. This may involve an expansion investment, a new market orientation (repositioning), or simply an IS analysis of the current state to identify a need for action for the future. In these situations, the companies TDC and prof. fh dr. illing & partner come into play.
partnerDescriptions.premedion: Premedion is the specialist for comprehensive consulting, tailor-made development, and professional implementation of projects and concepts in the areas of Health & SPA Business. It is part of the Deutsche Seereederei group of companies and a majority shareholder in the Medical Prevention Center Hamburg (MPCH).
partnerDescriptions.pacific-wings-consulting: Specialized in consulting services in tourism, pacific wings consulting offers support and assistance for tourism destinations, hotels, and tour operators. In an increasingly dynamic market environment, service quality, credit management, and the development and training of employees are one of the most important factors to be able to successfully compete in the market. Pacific wings consulting offers you a wide range of tools and opportunities to improve your market presence.
partnerDescriptions.quality-spa: QUALITY SPA creates operational and planning concepts for wellness, spa, and health facilities and supports in all structural and economic development phases.
partnerDescriptions.thv-gruppe: The THV Group includes THV Versicherungsmakler GmbH, Paetau Sports Versicherungsmakler GmbH, and THS Services Versicherungsvermittlung GmbH. All three companies are professionally engaged in all questions of risk identification and risk protection on behalf of their customers. Their services include: Analysis, consulting, and optimization of existing insurance contracts, new innovative insurance solutions, sustainable contract and claims management, IT and outsourcing solutions.
partnerDescriptions.unternehmensberatung-klaus-dribbusch: The Klaus Dribbusch consulting firm with the main topics of business planning & controlling as well as document management & process handling advises and supports you on all questions of economic business management of your company or your institution.
partnerDescriptions.thalgo: THALGO is a globally active group, present in 85 countries, and has become synonymous with quality and authenticity in sea-based treatments and products. The company researches, develops, tests, and produces at its headquarters in Roquebrune-sur-Argens on the Côte d'Azur and continues to expand into new markets through constant innovation.
partnerDescriptions.progenom: ProGenom offers genetic analyses in the medical departments of their Medical Wellness partner hotels and with partner physicians. They work within a network of renowned physicians, natural scientists, human geneticists, and molecular biologists, utilizing the latest scientific findings in preventive medical test systems.
partnerDescriptions.healomed: Healomed GmbH, based in Munich, is an internationally active company specializing in the distribution of medical products, particularly magnetic pulse devices. As the general importer of the PEMF-100 electromagnetic field generator from PEMF Systems Incorporated, they are responsible for its distribution in Germany, Austria, and Switzerland.
partnerDescriptions.terme-dobrna: Terme Dobrna is one of the oldest thermal spas in Slovenia. The thermal water of Dobrna has been known for its healing effects for centuries. Today, Terme Dobrna is a modern health resort that combines tradition with the latest medical knowledge.
partnerDescriptions.pino-gmbh: PINO GmbH is a manufacturer of high-quality massage and therapy products. For over 30 years, the company has been developing and producing innovative solutions for physiotherapy, wellness, and sports.
partnerDescriptions.salt-of-life-international-ag: The FREELAXX FLOATING systems are the latest product from SALT OF LIFE TECHNOLOGY GMBH, which belongs to the Swiss SALT OF LIFE AG. For over 15 years, companies of SALT OF LIFE AG have been developing practical applications in the field of bath/light therapies for chronic skin diseases.
partnerDescriptions.schupp-gmbh: As a complete provider in the areas of physiotherapy, medical training therapy, and wellness, Schupp GmbH & Co KG offers everything needed for successful treatment: From equipment such as treatment tables, MTT devices, or infrared radiators to preparations like massage agents, fango, and bath additives, to practice organization with appointment planners and patient record cards.
partnerDescriptions.deagecosmetics: deageCOSMETICS — against the signs of time — stands for the most modern, natural cosmetic creations and is a guarantee for quality and development expertise. Their range is based on the results of years of intensive research and is specially tailored to individual needs.
partnerDescriptions.his-solution: As a leading German company, HIS-Solution offers one of the most modern individually configurable software systems for appointment planning in the SPA-Vital-Beauty-Wellness sector.
partnerDescriptions.vibb-fit-medical-gmbh: vibb-FIT-medical GmbH provides vibration devices to customers, guests, or patients, offering them the chance for improved health, fitness, well-being, and beauty. Just as every person is different, with unique needs and requirements, your vibration wellness island must be designed individually.
partnerDescriptions.purity-factor: Purity Factor is a distribution platform for TriSerum®, a 30-day complete build-up cure for permanent anti-wrinkle treatment that works like a natural fountain of youth. It consists of some of the most coveted ingredients in the cosmetics industry: hyaluron, collagen, and amino acids.
partnerDescriptions.svg: Since its founding in 1997, SVG Medizinsysteme GmbH & Co. KG has been based on the principle of inspiring through strong performance and best service. As one of the leading full-range providers in German-speaking countries, they offer over 2,000 items, many of them directly available from stock.
partnerDescriptions.danubius-health-spa: Welcome to Danubius, Europe's largest and most experienced thermal hotel operator! They have specialized their therapeutic and wellness services on the healing and relaxing effects of the earth's natural resources. Invest in your health and visit one of their luxurious thermal hotels.
partnerDescriptions.hotel-eggensberger: Hotel Eggensberger is the first TÜV-certified Medical Wellness facility in Germany. As an organic and wellness hotel with a therapy center and ISO 9001:2000 certification, it offers multi-dimensional, dynamic-systematic processes that go hand in hand with the production of holistic individual well-being in the context of scientifically proven health-promoting or medical factors.
partnerDescriptions.hotel-elbresidenz-bad-schandau: For those who want to enjoy nature and culture in Saxon Switzerland and the surrounding cities, Bad Schandau is the place to visit. It offers an enchanting landscape for nature lovers, cultural diversity of all genres, and pure relaxation, optionally combinable with medical prevention.
partnerDescriptions.hotel-monchgut-auf-rugen: The newly opened spa and wellness hotel is embedded in the grounds of the Waldhotel, surrounded by a park landscape with over 15,000 roses, offering a magnificent view of the Baltic Sea and direct access to the amber promenade.
partnerDescriptions.oceano-vitality-hotel: In the green, quiet north of Tenerife, in the small fishing village of Punta del Hidalgo, is the privately run OCÉANO Vitality Hotel & Medical Spa, the first certified Medical Wellness Hotel in Spain. The direct view of the vastness of the ocean and the dreamlike sunsets can be admired from every room.
partnerDescriptions.rondane-spa-hoytjellshotell: Rondane Spa, with its unique location at the gateway to Rondane National Park, offers everything from hiking in the mountains to rafting in wild mountain rivers. The hotel's own wellness area is the perfect end after the day's experiences.
partnerDescriptions.santiburi-golf-resort: Santiburi is an exclusive villa complex on the 3 km long private beach at the picturesque Mae Nam Beach. It features classic Thai architecture in a unique botanical garden – a member of "The Leading Small Hotels of the World".
partnerDescriptions.sirona: The international association for balneology and tourism "SIRONA" specializes in investment projects, construction and management of residential and hotel balneo complexes, with a program for balneotherapy and mountain tourism.
partnerDescriptions.medizinisches-zentrum-albena: The seaside resort Albena on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast offers 14,900 beds in 43 hotels and 5 villa complexes, plus over 100 restaurants, spa & wellness centers, as well as numerous sports and entertainment facilities.
partnerDescriptions.parkhotel-sulzhayn: The Parkhotel Sülzhayn is located in the spa town of Sülzhayn on the southern edge of the Harz Mountains. Surrounded by mixed forests and mountain meadows, it offers an ideal environment for relaxation and active holidays, with many excursion destinations nearby.
partnerDescriptions.dr-wahlmann-und-dr-griesse: Dr. Wahlmann and Partners are proven specialists and innovation leaders in various fields of dentistry as well as dental aesthetics and cosmetic dentistry.
partnerDescriptions.zentrum-fuer-sportmedizin: Would you like to know about your health & fitness status? Would you like to optimize your training or do something for your health through sports? The Center for Sports Medicine has the right offer for you in any case.
partnerDescriptions.johannesbad-unternehmensgruppe: The Johannesbad Group is a successful provider of medical and health-oriented services with nine locations in three European countries. With almost 1,300 employees, the group is one of the largest in the healthcare sector.
partnerDescriptions.thueringen-kliniken: The Thüringen-Kliniken "Georgius-Agricola" Saalfeld-Rudolstadt GmbH sees itself as a hospital for advanced care. Since 1991, the company has been in the legal form of a GmbH, whose sole shareholder is the district of Saalfeld-Rudolstadt. The Thüringen-Kliniken Saalfeld-Rudolstadt GmbH is one of the academic teaching hospitals of the Friedrich-Schiller-University Jena.
partnerDescriptions.michels-kliniken: In our rehabilitation clinics in the areas of Saxony, Berlin-Brandenburg and Lower Saxony, we offer rehabilitation services in the fields of neurology, orthopedics, cardiology, pneumology, dermatology, pediatrics and psychosomatics.
partnerDescriptions.internationale-praevention-organisation: Founded in 1992, the IPO is now the largest independent non-profit network for health communication in Europe. The interdisciplinary competence for presenting important topic complexes in the health market is of the highest importance. The focus is on the production of various platforms for presenting important developments in health policy, medicine, science and economics. For the structural change in the healthcare system – towards a clear health economy – the IPO develops future-oriented solution approaches for all partners.
partnerDescriptions.berufsverband-deutscher-praeventologinne: The Professional Association of German Preventologists e.V. is a network of people who are committed to prevention and health promotion. Preventologists are courageous pioneers for new thinking and acting in dealing with the health problems of our time as well as our society.
partnerDescriptions.proventika: The Proventika Academy has set itself the goal of imparting the new findings of brain research, neurosciences and neuromedicine to interested physicians, medical assistants, coaches and trainers in a practice-relevant manner. For this purpose, in cooperation with the German Institute for Integrative Neuromedicine e.V. (DINM), teaching content and curricula have been developed that enable a qualified implementation of integrative stress counseling and stress medicine, integrative stress and neuro-coaching in medical and professional activities.
partnerDescriptions.thomas-wildey-institut: Institute for clinic and practice-coupled basic research. In 1977, the Thomas-Wildey-Institute was founded by Dr. Karl Daxl in Munich, who dedicated his work to new paths in medicine. The TWI now counts numerous physicians, institutions, research facilities and persons from the most diverse medical, economic, social, societal and political directions and groupings among its members, all of whom make their respective contributions to further develop the future of our society in a human-compatible way in medicine.
partnerDescriptions.mediplus-reisen: Mediplus Travel combines vacation and health into a holistic travel experience for body, mind and soul through its unique concept.
partnerDescriptions.shanghai-jin-jiang-tours: Shanghai China International Travel Service Co., Ltd was founded in 1994. Since then, CITS B-shares have been listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange. The company is one of the largest professional travel service providers in China.
partnerDescriptions.tourvital: TOUR VITAL is the specialist for medically accompanied trips worldwide. Over 400 doctors travel with our guests annually. Selected spa and wellness trips, river and ocean cruises, long-term vacations and city trips round off the offer.

ensana.description: Europe's largest health spa operator with luxury hotels in 6 countries. Specializing in natural healing resources including thermal water, mineral water, salt water, healing mud, and natural CO₂ treatments.

biohotelEggensberger.description: 4-star organic hotel with a fantastic view over the 'Allgäu Riviera'. Climate-positive, family-run hotel with organic vital cuisine, garden spa, therapy center and e-mobility.

hotelElbresidenz.description: Luxury hotel directly on the Elbe River, surrounded by the impressive natural scenery of the Elbe Sandstone Mountains. Located between Dresden and Prague.

oceano.name: OCÉANO Health Spa Hotel
oceano.description: Exclusive health spa hotel located directly on the Atlantic Ocean at the foot of the Anaga Biosphere Reserve. Family-run in third generation, offering F.X. Mayr Center.

rondane.name: Rondane Høyfjellshotell
rondane.description: Traditional mountain hotel closest to Rondane National Park, offering comprehensive wellness facilities and outdoor activities in pristine nature.

hotelFlamingo.name: Flamingo Grand Hotel & SPA Albena
hotelFlamingo.description: 5-star luxury resort hotel in Albena, awarded with the Blue Flag eco-label. Part of a sustainable tourism complex with 6km beautiful beach and natural reserve.
